cgcloud__Account_Sales_Data__c.name: cgcloud__Account_Sales_Data__c
cgcloud__Account_Sales_Data__c.description: Contains the information of the sales of a customer for two consecutive years. Access of the object provided to the System Admin.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

cgcloud__Month__c.description: Specifies the month for which the sales data is for.

cgcloud__Record_Link__c.description: Link to the detail page of the customer sales data record.

cgcloud__Year__c.description: Specifies the year for which the sales data is for.
